about_the_game:
TLDR
OnOrbit is a high-fidelity space hardware simulator / sandbox for space enthusiasts.

Think of a cross between KSP & MS Flight Simulator with some unique twists:
– It’s real time
– It uses real parts (as close to possible)
– It’s located in our actual solar system
– You can create spacecraft and upgrade space stations in game
– There’s a potential future hardware modding platform that modders and enthusiasts can get right into.

Welcome, to orbit!

We’re going, Together.

Join OnOrbit’s Supranational Space Cooperative (SSC) on its journey to make life multiplanetary. Your personal mission? Develop the skills you need to take humanity out into the solar system.

– Complete missions, develop trust, harden your psyche and climb the SSC ranks.
-Build spacecraft and space stations in a realistic, high-fidelity simulator using real world parts.
– Operate and sustain your spacecraft, your space station and yourself.
– Learn the psychology to survive in the harshness of space.

Once your technical and psychological training is complete, use your knowledge to head out to the planets and build, build, build!
